channel_id.description: The encoded `channel_id` to add or remove to workspaces.

team_id.description: The workspace to which the channel belongs. Omit this argument if the channel is a cross-workspace shared channel.

target_team_ids.description: A comma-separated list of workspaces to which the channel should be shared. Not required if the channel is being shared org-wide.

org_channel.description: True if channel has to be converted to an org channel
